attributes.action: block the expansion of Lydd airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Expansion of the airport would be environmentally irresponsible and act against the governments policy for sustainable development, as well as put lives at risk

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "block the expansion of Lydd airport."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15790.asp

Prime Minister's Office
